name: Bounded (JaxterMG)
description:
You wake up in your room, but soon you meet strange person in the mirror

----------------------------------------Controls------------------------------------------

Arrows - movement.

E - interact.

---------------------------------------Important------------------------------------------

Use fullscreen mode :))))

You can softlock yourself in second room if you skip bathroom mirror or codelock. 

Site is laggy,  couldn't  submit update in time.
